messages.title: END THIS MESS
messages.content: Vote to end Boris Johnson transforms the party of Leave.

messages.title: REMAINERS
messages.content: The choice for Remain. Lib Dems. The party of Remain.

messages.title: BREXIT BACKINGTIVES
messages.content: The Conservative party now the Brexit party. Nigel Farage's Brexit party will not deliver Europe.

messages.title: Lib Dems lead the fight to stop Brexit
messages.content: Liberal Democrats want to stop Brexit. We've been fighting it since the day after the referendum. Lib Dems to stop Brexit.

mentions.tacticalSituation: ONLY THE LIBDEMS CAN BEAT THE TORIES HERE.

issues.brexitEurope: Stopping Brexit means that we can focus on tackling the big issues facing the UK right now. We can build a Britain where we can grow our economy, tackle the climate emergency, and address the crises in our NHS and schools.
issues.health: address the crises in our NHS

contactInformation.address: Freepost RSTK-KHSK-EJGE, Lib Dems, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

images.caption: Lib Dems lead the fight to stop Brexit
